briefTitle: Phase 3 Efficacy and Safety Study of CD07805/47 Topical Gel in Subjects With Facial Erythema Associated With Rosacea
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Randomized Double-Blind, Vehicle-Controlled, Parallel Group Study to Demonstrate the Efficacy and Safety of CD07805/47 Gel Applied Topically Once Daily in Subjects With Moderate to Severe Facial Erythema Associated With Rosacea
summary: Phase 3 efficacy and safety study of CD07805/47 topical gel in subjects with facial erythema associated with rosacea. The study hypothesis is that CD07805/47 gel, applied topically once daily is more efficacious than vehicle and provides an acceptable safety profile in the treatment of facial erythema associated with rosacea.
